name: derogatorily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows strong disapproval and does not show respect: It is an example of what is sometimes derogatorily called "armchair science". It's a fair point, but you could have made it slightly less derogatorily.
More examplesFewer examplesThe term was somewhat derogatorily applied to foreign labourers.They don't use the term "working-class" except derogatorily.The amount of coverage in the article devoted to African Americans who served in combat is derogatorily minimal. Those with invisible disabilities often found themselves derogatorily referred to as "workshy".
